participant_1.background:
I take my cats for walks along the beach to break the monotony of my life.
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i don t like working long hours.
i like fast food too much.
I like going to Halloween parties because I can dress up and be someone else.

participant_2.background:
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I like to share my time and company with others.
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Pretty good, how about you?
I'm doing okay. What do you do for a living?
I'm a personal trainer, 5 days a week. What about you?
I'm a teacher, I love my job.
That's great! I bet you get a lot of satisfaction from it.
Yes, I do. I love helping people learn and grow.
That's awesome. I love helping people too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to garden and cook.
That's really cool. I like to go for walks along the beach with my cats.
That sounds really relaxing. I love Halloween parties too, I love being able to dress up and be someone else.
Me too! It's so much fun to let loose and have fun.
I agree. I'm glad we're on the same page about things.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone new who shares similar interests.
I agree. I hope we can stay in touch.
Me too! We should exchange numbers.
Sure! Here's my number: 555-555-5555.
Thanks! Here's mine: 555-555-5555.
Great! I'll text you later.
Sounds good!
